p: The results showed that MeOH, CH 2Cl 2, and EtOAc extracts (0.2-200 μg/mL), n-hexane (2-200 μg/mL), and H 2O extract (20 and 200 μg/mL) had inhibitory effect on melanin synthesis ( P < 0.05) ( Fig. 3). However, all of the concentrations of essential oil and BuOH extract had no significant inhibitory effect on melanin synthesis.
